snippet: At least 73 people died in a brawl, refocusing attention on the failure of the government to re-establish order and threatening to provoke a new crisis during a political transition.
abstract: At least 73 people are killed in brawl between rival groups of soccer fans in Cairo, refocusing attention on the failure of the government to re-establish order and threatening to provoke a new crisis during a political transition.
lead_paragraph: At least 73 people died in a brawl, refocusing attention on the failure of the government to re-establish order and threatening to provoke a new crisis during a political transition.

headline.sub: Egyptian Soccer Riot Kills More Than 70
headline.main: Egyptian Soccer Riot Kills More Than 70
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Soccer Riot Kills More Than 70, and Many Blame Military
